game.name: Brave Hero
game.shortDescription: 용감한 영웅은 함정을 극복하고 퍼즐을 해결,모든 크리스탈 조각을 수집해야 플랫 포머입니다. 손재주를 사용하여 이동 플랫폼에 뛰어 순서대로 다시 세계를 넣어 모든 단계를 통해 생각합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: BRAVE HERO is a platformer where the player faces a seemingly simple task to collect all the shards of the crystal.

reviewHighlights.text: Short but challenging. Fast-paced, too. Once you get a hold of the controls, the game will deliver lots of fun.
Brave Hero is a "template flip", that is to say, it's a "game" that has been produced by copying a game template from GameMaker Studio, changing a few...
